name: $draft
desc: The task is ready to be acted upon and action is sought.

name: $requested
desc: A potential performer has claimed ownership of the task and is evaluating whether to perform it.

name: $received
desc: The potential performer has agreed to execute the task but has not yet started work.

name: $accepted
desc: The potential performer who claimed ownership of the task has decided not to execute it prior to performing any action.

name: $rejected
desc: The task is ready to be performed, but no action has yet been taken.  Used in place of requested/received/accepted/rejected when request assignment and acceptance is a given.

name: $cancelled
desc: The task has been started but is not yet complete.

name: $in-progress
desc: The task has been started but work has been paused.

name: $on-hold
desc: The task was attempted but could not be completed due to some error.

name: $completed
desc: The task should never have existed and is retained only because of the possibility it may have used.
